content: I’m presumably telling you what you already know, at least deep down, but… Basic: McClintock is going to win easy. Holding him to under 60% of the vote will be an achievement. True, Trump is a big wild card, but for McClintock to lose [and still be breathing] requires a record Democrat wave. Minor: The claimed McCintock tactic of riling the opposition so they react poorly seems to be working, as your own actions indicate.
